header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN GRAND COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 45, page 34, line 38, leave out “may cease to maintain an EHC plan for a child or young person only if— “, and insert “must maintain an EHC plan for a child or young person up to their 25th birthday unless— “
000: Clause 45, page 35, line 5, after “educational” insert “, health and social care”
000: Clause 45, page 35, line 7, leave out subsection (4)
